chunk:
Ilia Cucumber Water Stick (2018 formulation)

Brand: ILIA

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aqua/water, Sodium Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Cucumis Sativus Fruit Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cichorium Intybus (

Cichorium Intybus (Chicory) Root Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol.

Directions: Apply around eyes for a midday refresher, or after your morning cleanse to set a smooth foundation for makeup.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Repro
